3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent geometry with proper thickness and elevated perspective.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Strong fidelity; stairs, balcony, and all 3 bedrooms match the original layout proportions and adjacencies.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement matches the floor plan; bed orientations and sanitary fixtures are accurate.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean render with superb lighting; no visual clutter or text overlays.

detected_errors.description: The 'Linen' closet wall in Bed 2 is simplified, and specific robe door swing details are generalized.

summary: This is a high-fidelity 3D conversion that meticulously maintains the architectural footprint and room functionality of the source floor plan.
